1tek-desc: 1TEK Digital Technology Joint Stock Company - 1TEK., JSC was officially established on August 14, 2019 by a team of staff who have worked for big financial service companies in Vietnam and abroad, with extensive experience in the field of Fintech & Telecommunications Solutions.
performance_in_project: Performance in key leading to success
banner-content: Centered on excellent engineers, we aim to develop with high quality for Vietnam and global customers.
neural_network_desc: We have experience in designing and building e-wallet system with large of end users
mission_01_desc: Providing the best products and services, in accordance with the international standards.
mission_02_desc: Providing the digital products that make people's lives easier.
mission_03_desc: Upholding the spirit of cooperation for the mutual development, committing to become "Brothers connected for success together"
game_hub_desc: Gamification Platform is designed to integrate seamlessly, a wonderful entertainment world that enhances engagement and retains users for your application.
testing_desc: To ensure your product is error-free and performs seamlessly, Our thorough testing process guarantees high-quality software and user satisfaction.
software_dev_desc: A high-quality software development outsourcing services, we provide cost-effective and timely solutions with experienced developers, ensuring custom, scalable, and maintainable software to meet your business needs.
ui_ux_desc: Offering expert UI/UX website design services to elevate your online presence with intuitive, user-friendly, and visually appealing interfaces.
working_criteria_content: Never satisfied with the results achieved, always take responsible for being eager to learn and research the latest technologies to apply to company’s products and services.
product_quality_content: Committed to provide the best products and services, continuously make improvement to meet customer requirements.
customer_satisfication_content: Customers are the only boss, who can “fire” anyone in the company, including the Director.
long_term_content: Always make an effort to associate the collective interests with personal interests, and the interests the company with the interests of customers.
quality_content: Software Development Service, Digital services, Fintech services, especially products and services for the ecosystem of E-wallets (Mobile Money), E-banking (Digital Banking)
partnerTitle: We are constantly striving to improve service quality to bring more benefits and meet all customer requirements.
